tests.name: Homepage Load Test
tests.description: Test that the homepage loads correctly and displays the main content
steps: Verify the IPPAN Foundation title is displayed
Verify the hero section is visible
Verify the mission, programs, and forum cards are displayed
expected_results: All main content sections are visible

tests.name: Authentication Flow Test
tests.description: Test user registration and login functionality
steps: Test login with the created account
expected_results: User is redirected to forum after login

tests.name: Forum Navigation Test
tests.description: Test forum navigation and thread viewing
steps: Verify threads in that category are shown
Verify thread content and posts are displayed

tests.name: New Thread Creation Test
tests.description: Test creating a new forum thread (requires authentication)
steps: Verify thread is created and visible

tests.name: Admin Dashboard Access Test
tests.description: Test admin dashboard access and functionality
expected_results: Admin can view and manage content

tests.name: Responsive Design Test
tests.description: Test the application on different screen sizes
steps: Verify navigation works on all sizes
Verify content is readable on all sizes
Verify forms are usable on all sizes
expected_results: Navigation is functional on all devices
Content is readable on all screen sizes
Forms are usable on mobile devices
